akn:section.akn:heading: Coordination and communication of defense research activities and technology domain awareness

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Coordination of Department of Defense Research, Development, and Technological Data.—

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary of Defense shall promote, monitor, and evaluate programs for the communication and exchange of research, development, and technological data—
(b) In this section, the term “Defense research facility” has the meaning given that term by section 4125(b) of this title.
